item.title: CVE-2024-31939|2024-04-10T19:17:54.335Z -- Soflyy -- Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Soflyy Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress.This issue affects Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress: from n/a through 3.7.3.
